3120 #endif // #ifdef MINIZ_NO_TIME
3121  return MZ_TRUE;
3122 }
3123 
3124 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
3125 static mz_bool mz_zip_set_file_times(const char *pFilename, time_t access_time, time_t modified_time)
3126 {
3127  struct utimbuf t; t.actime = access_time; t.modtime = modified_time;
3128  return !utime(pFilename, &t);
3129 }
3130 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
3131 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3132 
3133 static mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_internal(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint32 flags)
3134 {
3135  (void)flags;
3136  if ((!pZip) || (pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID))
3137  return MZ_FALSE;
3138 
3139  if (!pZip->m_pAlloc) pZip->m_pAlloc = def_alloc_func;
3140  if (!pZip->m_pFree) pZip->m_pFree = def_free_func;
3141  if (!pZip->m_pRealloc) pZip->m_pRealloc = def_realloc_func;
3142 
3143  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING;
3144  pZip->m_archive_size = 0;
3145  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
3146  pZip->m_total_files = 0;
3147 
3148  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState = (mz_zip_internal_state *)pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state))))
3149  return MZ_FALSE;
3150  memset(pZip->m_pState, 0, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state));
3151  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, sizeof(mz_uint8));
3152  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, sizeof(mz_uint32));
3153  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, sizeof(mz_uint32));
3154  return MZ_TRUE;
3155 }
3156 
3157 static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_reader_filename_less(const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_array, const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint l_index, mz_uint r_index)
3158 {
3159  const mz_uint8 *pL = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8, MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, l_index)), *pE;
3160  const mz_uint8 *pR = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8, MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, r_index));
3161  mz_uint l_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pL + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS), r_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pR + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
3162  mz_uint8 l = 0, r = 0;
3163  pL += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE; pR += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
3164  pE = pL + MZ_MIN(l_len, r_len);
3165  while (pL < pE)
3166  {
3167  if ((l = MZ_TOLOWER(*pL)) != (r = MZ_TOLOWER(*pR)))
3168  break;
3169  pL++; pR++;
3170  }
3171  return (pL == pE) ? (l_len < r_len) : (l < r);
3172 }
3173 
3174 #define MZ_SWAP_UINT32(a, b) do { mz_uint32 t = a; a = b; b = t; } MZ_MACRO_END
3175 
3176 // Heap sort of lowercased filenames, used to help accelerate plain central directory searches by mz_zip_reader_locate_file(). (Could also use qsort(), but it could allocate memory.)
3177 static void mz_zip_reader_sort_central_dir_offsets_by_filename(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
3178 {
3179  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
3180  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets = &pState->m_central_dir_offsets;
3181  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir = &pState->m_central_dir;
3182  mz_uint32 *pIndices = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, 0);
3183  const int size = pZip->m_total_files;
3184  int start = (size - 2) >> 1, end;
3185  while (start >= 0)
3186  {
3187  int child, root = start;
3188  for ( ; ; )
3189  {
3190  if ((child = (root << 1) + 1) >= size)
3191  break;
3192  child += (((child + 1) < size) && (mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets, pIndices[child], pIndices[child + 1])));
3193  if (!mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets, pIndices[root], pIndices[child]))
3194  break;
3195  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[root], pIndices[child]); root = child;
3196  }
3197  start--;
3198  }
3199 
3200  end = size - 1;
3201  while (end > 0)
3202  {
3203  int child, root = 0;
3204  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[end], pIndices[0]);
3205  for ( ; ; )
3206  {
3207  if ((child = (root << 1) + 1) >= end)
3208  break;
3209  child += (((child + 1) < end) && mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets, pIndices[child], pIndices[child + 1]));
3210  if (!mz_zip_reader_filename_less(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets, pIndices[root], pIndices[child]))
3211  break;
3212  MZ_SWAP_UINT32(pIndices[root], pIndices[child]); root = child;
3213  }
3214  end--;
3215  }
3216 }
3217 
3218 static mz_bool mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint32 flags)
3219 {
3220  mz_uint cdir_size, num_this_disk, cdir_disk_index;
3221  mz_uint64 cdir_ofs;
3222  mz_int64 cur_file_ofs;
3223  const mz_uint8 *p;
3224  mz_uint32 buf_u32[4096 / sizeof(mz_uint32)]; mz_uint8 *pBuf = (mz_uint8 *)buf_u32;
3225  mz_bool sort_central_dir = ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_DO_NOT_SORT_CENTRAL_DIRECTORY) == 0);
3226  // Basic sanity checks - reject files which are too small, and check the first 4 bytes of the file to make sure a local header is there.
3227  if (pZip->m_archive_size < MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
3228  return MZ_FALSE;
3229  // Find the end of central directory record by scanning the file from the end towards the beginning.
3230  cur_file_ofs = MZ_MAX((mz_int64)pZip->m_archive_size - (mz_int64)sizeof(buf_u32), 0);
3231  for ( ; ; )
3232  {
3233  int i, n = (int)MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf_u32), pZip->m_archive_size - cur_file_ofs);
3234  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf, n) != (mz_uint)n)
3235  return MZ_FALSE;
3236  for (i = n - 4; i >= 0; --i)
3237  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + i) == MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
3238  break;
3239  if (i >= 0)
3240  {
3241  cur_file_ofs += i;
3242  break;
3243  }
3244  if ((!cur_file_ofs) || ((pZip->m_archive_size - cur_file_ofs) >= (0xFFFF + MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)))
3245  return MZ_FALSE;
3246  cur_file_ofs = MZ_MAX(cur_file_ofs - (sizeof(buf_u32) - 3), 0);
3247  }
3248  // Read and verify the end of central directory record.
3249  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf, MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) != MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
3250  return MZ_FALSE;
3251  if ((MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_SIG_OFS) != MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG) ||
3252  ((pZip->m_total_files = MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_TOTAL_ENTRIES_OFS)) != MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_NUM_ENTRIES_ON_DISK_OFS)))
3253  return MZ_FALSE;
3254 
3255  num_this_disk = MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_THIS_DISK_OFS);
3256  cdir_disk_index = MZ_READ_LE16(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_NUM_DISK_CDIR_OFS);
3257  if (((num_this_disk | cdir_disk_index) != 0) && ((num_this_disk != 1) || (cdir_disk_index != 1)))
3258  return MZ_FALSE;
3259 
3260  if ((cdir_size = MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_SIZE_OFS)) < pZip->m_total_files * MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
3261  return MZ_FALSE;
3262 
3263  cdir_ofs = MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_OFS_OFS);
3264  if ((cdir_ofs + (mz_uint64)cdir_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
3265  return MZ_FALSE;
3266 
3267  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = cdir_ofs;
3268 
3269  if (pZip->m_total_files)
3270  {
3271  mz_uint i, n;
3272 
3273  // Read the entire central directory into a heap block, and allocate another heap block to hold the unsorted central dir file record offsets, and another to hold the sorted indices.
3274  if ((!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, cdir_size, MZ_FALSE)) ||
3275  (!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, pZip->m_total_files, MZ_FALSE)))
3276  return MZ_FALSE;
3277 
3278  if (sort_central_dir)
3279  {
3280  if (!mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, pZip->m_total_files, MZ_FALSE))
3281  return MZ_FALSE;
3282  }
3283 
3284  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cdir_ofs, pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p, cdir_size) != cdir_size)
3285  return MZ_FALSE;
3286 
3287  // Now create an index into the central directory file records, do some basic sanity checking on each record, and check for zip64 entries (which are not yet supported).
3288  p = (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p;
3289  for (n = cdir_size, i = 0; i < pZip->m_total_files; ++i)
3290  {
3291  mz_uint total_header_size, comp_size, decomp_size, disk_index;
3292  if ((n < MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) || (MZ_READ_LE32(p) != MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG))
3293  return MZ_FALSE;
3294  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, i) = (mz_uint32)(p - (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir.m_p);
3295  if (sort_central_dir)
3296  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, i) = i;
3297  comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3298  decomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3299  if (((!MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS)) && (decomp_size != comp_size)) || (decomp_size && !comp_size) || (decomp_size == 0xFFFFFFFF) || (comp_size == 0xFFFFFFFF))
3300  return MZ_FALSE;
3301  disk_index = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DISK_START_OFS);
3302  if ((disk_index != num_this_disk) && (disk_index != 1))
3303  return MZ_FALSE;
3304  if (((mz_uint64)MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS) + MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
3305  return MZ_FALSE;
3306  if ((total_header_size = MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS)) > n)
3307  return MZ_FALSE;
3308  n -= total_header_size; p += total_header_size;
3309  }
3310  }
3311 
3312  if (sort_central_dir)
3313  mz_zip_reader_sort_central_dir_offsets_by_filename(pZip);
3314 
3315  return MZ_TRUE;
3316 }
3317 
3318 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint64 size, mz_uint32 flags)
3319 {
3320  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pRead))
3321  return MZ_FALSE;
3322  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags))
3323  return MZ_FALSE;
3324  pZip->m_archive_size = size;
3325  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags))
3326  {
3327  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
3328  return MZ_FALSE;
3329  }
3330  return MZ_TRUE;
3331 }
3332 
3333 static size_t mz_zip_mem_read_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs, void *pBuf, size_t n)
3334 {
3335  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
3336  size_t s = (file_ofs >= pZip->m_archive_size) ? 0 : (size_t)MZ_MIN(pZip->m_archive_size - file_ofs, n);
3337  memcpy(pBuf, (const mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + file_ofs, s);
3338  return s;
3339 }
3340 
3341 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const void *pMem, size_t size, mz_uint32 flags)
3342 {
3343  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags))
3344  return MZ_FALSE;
3345  pZip->m_archive_size = size;
3346  pZip->m_pRead = mz_zip_mem_read_func;
3347  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
3348 #ifdef __cplusplus
3349  pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = const_cast<void *>(pMem);
3350 #else
3351  pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = (void *)pMem;
3352 #endif
3353  pZip->m_pState->m_mem_size = size;
3354  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags))
3355  {
3356  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
3357  return MZ_FALSE;
3358  }
3359  return MZ_TRUE;
3360 }
3361 
3362 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3363 static size_t mz_zip_file_read_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs, void *pBuf, size_t n)
3364 {
3365  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
3366  mz_int64 cur_ofs = MZ_FTELL64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
3367  if (((mz_int64)file_ofs < 0) || (((cur_ofs != (mz_int64)file_ofs)) && (MZ_FSEEK64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile, (mz_int64)file_ofs, SEEK_SET))))
3368  return 0;
3369  return MZ_FREAD(pBuf, 1, n, pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
3370 }
3371 
3372 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_init_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, mz_uint32 flags)
3373 {
3374  mz_uint64 file_size;
3375  MZ_FILE *pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pFilename, "rb");
3376  if (!pFile)
3377  return MZ_FALSE;
3378  if (MZ_FSEEK64(pFile, 0, SEEK_END))
3379  {
3380  MZ_FCLOSE(pFile);
3381  return MZ_FALSE;
3382  }
3383  file_size = MZ_FTELL64(pFile);
3384  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_internal(pZip, flags))
3385  {
3386  MZ_FCLOSE(pFile);
3387  return MZ_FALSE;
3388  }
3389  pZip->m_pRead = mz_zip_file_read_func;
3390  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
3391  pZip->m_pState->m_pFile = pFile;
3392  pZip->m_archive_size = file_size;
3393  if (!mz_zip_reader_read_central_dir(pZip, flags))
3394  {
3395  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
3396  return MZ_FALSE;
3397  }
3398  return MZ_TRUE;
3399 }
3400 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3401 
3402 mz_uint mz_zip_reader_get_num_files(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
3403 {
3404  return pZip ? pZip->m_total_files : 0;
3405 }
3406 
3407 static MZ_FORCEINLINE const mz_uint8 *mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index)
3408 {
3409  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (file_index >= pZip->m_total_files) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
3410  return NULL;
3411  return &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, mz_uint8, MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, file_index));
3412 }
3413 
3414 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_is_file_encrypted(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index)
3415 {
3416  mz_uint m_bit_flag;
3417  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
3418  if (!p)
3419  return MZ_FALSE;
3420  m_bit_flag = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS);
3421  return (m_bit_flag & 1);
3422 }
3423 
3424 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index)
3425 {
3426  mz_uint filename_len, external_attr;
3427  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
3428  if (!p)
3429  return MZ_FALSE;
3430 
3431  // First see if the filename ends with a '/' character.
3432  filename_len = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
3433  if (filename_len)
3434  {
3435  if (*(p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + filename_len - 1) == '/')
3436  return MZ_TRUE;
3437  }
3438 
3439  // Bugfix: This code was also checking if the internal attribute was non-zero, which wasn't correct.
3440  // Most/all zip writers (hopefully) set DOS file/directory attributes in the low 16-bits, so check for the DOS directory flag and ignore the source OS ID in the created by field.
3441  // FIXME: Remove this check? Is it necessary - we already check the filename.
3442  external_attr = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
3443  if ((external_attr & 0x10) != 0)
3444  return MZ_TRUE;
3445 
3446  return MZ_FALSE;
3447 }
3448 
3449 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_file_stat(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, mz_zip_archive_file_stat *pStat)
3450 {
3451  mz_uint n;
3452  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
3453  if ((!p) || (!pStat))
3454  return MZ_FALSE;
3455 
3456  // Unpack the central directory record.
3457  pStat->m_file_index = file_index;
3458  pStat->m_central_dir_ofs = MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, file_index);
3459  pStat->m_version_made_by = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_MADE_BY_OFS);
3460  pStat->m_version_needed = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS);
3461  pStat->m_bit_flag = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS);
3462  pStat->m_method = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS);
3463 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
3464  pStat->m_time = mz_zip_dos_to_time_t(MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_TIME_OFS), MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_DATE_OFS));
3465 #endif
3466  pStat->m_crc32 = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_CRC32_OFS);
3467  pStat->m_comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3468  pStat->m_uncomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3469  pStat->m_internal_attr = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_INTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
3470  pStat->m_external_attr = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS);
3471  pStat->m_local_header_ofs = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS);
3472 
3473  // Copy as much of the filename and comment as possible.
3474  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS); n = MZ_MIN(n, MZ_ZIP_MAX_ARCHIVE_FILENAME_SIZE - 1);
3475  memcpy(pStat->m_filename, p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE, n); pStat->m_filename[n] = '\0';
3476 
3477  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS); n = MZ_MIN(n, MZ_ZIP_MAX_ARCHIVE_FILE_COMMENT_SIZE - 1);
3478  pStat->m_comment_size = n;
3479  memcpy(pStat->m_comment, p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS), n); pStat->m_comment[n] = '\0';
3480 
3481  return MZ_TRUE;
3482 }
3483 
3484 mz_uint mz_zip_reader_get_filename(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, char *pFilename, mz_uint filename_buf_size)
3485 {
3486  mz_uint n;
3487  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
3488  if (!p) { if (filename_buf_size) pFilename[0] = '\0'; return 0; }
3489  n = MZ_READ_LE16(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
3490  if (filename_buf_size)
3491  {
3492  n = MZ_MIN(n, filename_buf_size - 1);
3493  memcpy(pFilename, p + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE, n);
3494  pFilename[n] = '\0';
3495  }
3496  return n + 1;
3497 }
3498 
3499 static MZ_FORCEINLINE mz_bool mz_zip_reader_string_equal(const char *pA, const char *pB, mz_uint len, mz_uint flags)
3500 {
3501  mz_uint i;
3502  if (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_CASE_SENSITIVE)
3503  return 0 == memcmp(pA, pB, len);
3504  for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
3505  if (MZ_TOLOWER(pA[i]) != MZ_TOLOWER(pB[i]))
3506  return MZ_FALSE;
3507  return MZ_TRUE;
3508 }
3509 
3510 static MZ_FORCEINLINE int mz_zip_reader_filename_compare(const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_array, const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint l_index, const char *pR, mz_uint r_len)
3511 {
3512  const mz_uint8 *pL = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_array, mz_uint8, MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(pCentral_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, l_index)), *pE;
3513  mz_uint l_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pL + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
3514  mz_uint8 l = 0, r = 0;
3515  pL += MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
3516  pE = pL + MZ_MIN(l_len, r_len);
3517  while (pL < pE)
3518  {
3519  if ((l = MZ_TOLOWER(*pL)) != (r = MZ_TOLOWER(*pR)))
3520  break;
3521  pL++; pR++;
3522  }
3523  return (pL == pE) ? (int)(l_len - r_len) : (l - r);
3524 }
3525 
3526 static int mz_zip_reader_locate_file_binary_search(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename)
3527 {
3528  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
3529  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir_offsets = &pState->m_central_dir_offsets;
3530  const mz_zip_array *pCentral_dir = &pState->m_central_dir;
3531  mz_uint32 *pIndices = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, 0);
3532  const int size = pZip->m_total_files;
3533  const mz_uint filename_len = (mz_uint)strlen(pFilename);
3534  int l = 0, h = size - 1;
3535  while (l <= h)
3536  {
3537  int m = (l + h) >> 1, file_index = pIndices[m], comp = mz_zip_reader_filename_compare(pCentral_dir, pCentral_dir_offsets, file_index, pFilename, filename_len);
3538  if (!comp)
3539  return file_index;
3540  else if (comp < 0)
3541  l = m + 1;
3542  else
3543  h = m - 1;
3544  }
3545  return -1;
3546 }
3547 
3548 int mz_zip_reader_locate_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pName, const char *pComment, mz_uint flags)
3549 {
3550  mz_uint file_index; size_t name_len, comment_len;
3551  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pName) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
3552  return -1;
3553  if (((flags & (MZ_ZIP_FLAG_IGNORE_PATH | MZ_ZIP_FLAG_CASE_SENSITIVE)) == 0) && (!pComment) && (pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets.m_size))
3554  return mz_zip_reader_locate_file_binary_search(pZip, pName);
3555  name_len = strlen(pName); if (name_len > 0xFFFF) return -1;
3556  comment_len = pComment ? strlen(pComment) : 0; if (comment_len > 0xFFFF) return -1;
3557  for (file_index = 0; file_index < pZip->m_total_files; file_index++)
3558  {
3559  const mz_uint8 *pHeader = &MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, mz_uint8, MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_ELEMENT(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, mz_uint32, file_index));
3560  mz_uint filename_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS);
3561  const char *pFilename = (const char *)pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
3562  if (filename_len < name_len)
3563  continue;
3564  if (comment_len)
3565  {
3566  mz_uint file_extra_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS), file_comment_len = MZ_READ_LE16(pHeader + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS);
3567  const char *pFile_comment = pFilename + filename_len + file_extra_len;
3568  if ((file_comment_len != comment_len) || (!mz_zip_reader_string_equal(pComment, pFile_comment, file_comment_len, flags)))
3569  continue;
3570  }
3571  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_IGNORE_PATH) && (filename_len))
3572  {
3573  int ofs = filename_len - 1;
3574  do
3575  {
3576  if ((pFilename[ofs] == '/') || (pFilename[ofs] == '\\') || (pFilename[ofs] == ':'))
3577  break;
3578  } while (--ofs >= 0);
3579  ofs++;
3580  pFilename += ofs; filename_len -= ofs;
3581  }
3582  if ((filename_len == name_len) && (mz_zip_reader_string_equal(pName, pFilename, filename_len, flags)))
3583  return file_index;
3584  }
3585  return -1;
3586 }
3587 
3588 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags, void *pUser_read_buf, size_t user_read_buf_size)
3589 {
3590  int status = TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
3591  mz_uint64 needed_size, cur_file_ofs, comp_remaining, out_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_size, read_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_avail;
3592  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
3593  void *pRead_buf;
3594  mz_uint32 local_header_u32[(MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(mz_uint32) - 1) / sizeof(mz_uint32)]; mz_uint8 *pLocal_header = (mz_uint8 *)local_header_u32;
3595  tinfl_decompressor inflator;
3596 
3597  if ((buf_size) && (!pBuf))
3598  return MZ_FALSE;
3599 
3600  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat))
3601  return MZ_FALSE;
3602 
3603  // Empty file, or a directory (but not always a directory - I've seen odd zips with directories that have compressed data which inflates to 0 bytes)
3604  if (!file_stat.m_comp_size)
3605  return MZ_TRUE;
3606 
3607  // Entry is a subdirectory (I've seen old zips with dir entries which have compressed deflate data which inflates to 0 bytes, but these entries claim to uncompress to 512 bytes in the headers).
3608  // I'm torn how to handle this case - should it fail instead?
3609  if (mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(pZip, file_index))
3610  return MZ_TRUE;
3611 
3612  // Encryption and patch files are not supported.
3613  if (file_stat.m_bit_flag & (1 | 32))
3614  return MZ_FALSE;
3615 
3616  // This function only supports stored and deflate.
3617  if ((!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)) && (file_stat.m_method != 0) && (file_stat.m_method != MZ_DEFLATED))
3618  return MZ_FALSE;
3619 
3620  // Ensure supplied output buffer is large enough.
3621  needed_size = (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) ? file_stat.m_comp_size : file_stat.m_uncomp_size;
3622  if (buf_size < needed_size)
3623  return MZ_FALSE;
3624 
3625  // Read and parse the local directory entry.
3626  cur_file_ofs = file_stat.m_local_header_ofs;
3627  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pLocal_header, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
3628  return MZ_FALSE;
3629  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pLocal_header) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
3630  return MZ_FALSE;
3631 
3632  cur_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS);
3633  if ((cur_file_ofs + file_stat.m_comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
3634  return MZ_FALSE;
3635 
3636  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) || (!file_stat.m_method))
3637  {
3638  // The file is stored or the caller has requested the compressed data.
3639  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pBuf, (size_t)needed_size) != needed_size)
3640  return MZ_FALSE;
3641  return ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) != 0) || (mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, (const mz_uint8 *)pBuf, (size_t)file_stat.m_uncomp_size) == file_stat.m_crc32);
3642  }
3643 
3644  // Decompress the file either directly from memory or from a file input buffer.
3645  tinfl_init(&inflator);
3646 
3647  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)
3648  {
3649  // Read directly from the archive in memory.
3650  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + cur_file_ofs;
3651  read_buf_size = read_buf_avail = file_stat.m_comp_size;
3652  comp_remaining = 0;
3653  }
3654  else if (pUser_read_buf)
3655  {
3656  // Use a user provided read buffer.
3657  if (!user_read_buf_size)
3658  return MZ_FALSE;
3659  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pUser_read_buf;
3660  read_buf_size = user_read_buf_size;
3661  read_buf_avail = 0;
3662  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
3663  }
3664  else
3665  {
3666  // Temporarily allocate a read buffer.
3667  read_buf_size = MZ_MIN(file_stat.m_comp_size, MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
3668 #ifdef _MSC_VER
3669  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (read_buf_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
3670 #else
3671  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (read_buf_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
3672 #endif
3673  return MZ_FALSE;
3674  if (NULL == (pRead_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, (size_t)read_buf_size)))
3675  return MZ_FALSE;
3676  read_buf_avail = 0;
3677  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
3678  }
3679 
3680  do
3681  {
3682  size_t in_buf_size, out_buf_size = (size_t)(file_stat.m_uncomp_size - out_buf_ofs);
3683  if ((!read_buf_avail) && (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem))
3684  {
3685  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
3686  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail)
3687  {
3688  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3689  break;
3690  }
3691  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
3692  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
3693  read_buf_ofs = 0;
3694  }
3695  in_buf_size = (size_t)read_buf_avail;
3696  status = tinfl_decompress(&inflator, (mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf + read_buf_ofs, &in_buf_size, (mz_uint8 *)pBuf, (mz_uint8 *)pBuf + out_buf_ofs, &out_buf_size, TINFL_FLAG_USING_NON_WRAPPING_OUTPUT_BUF | (comp_remaining ? TINFL_FLAG_HAS_MORE_INPUT : 0));
3697  read_buf_avail -= in_buf_size;
3698  read_buf_ofs += in_buf_size;
3699  out_buf_ofs += out_buf_size;
3700  } while (status == TINFL_STATUS_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT);
3701 
3702  if (status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE)
3703  {
3704  // Make sure the entire file was decompressed, and check its CRC.
3705  if ((out_buf_ofs != file_stat.m_uncomp_size) || (mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, (const mz_uint8 *)pBuf, (size_t)file_stat.m_uncomp_size) != file_stat.m_crc32))
3706  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3707  }
3708 
3709  if ((!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem) && (!pUser_read_buf))
3710  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
3711 
3712  return status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
3713 }
3714 
3715 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem_no_alloc(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags, void *pUser_read_buf, size_t user_read_buf_size)
3716 {
3717  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
3718  if (file_index < 0)
3719  return MZ_FALSE;
3720  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, file_index, pBuf, buf_size, flags, pUser_read_buf, user_read_buf_size);
3721 }
3722 
3723 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags)
3724 {
3725  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, file_index, pBuf, buf_size, flags, NULL, 0);
3726 }
3727 
3728 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, mz_uint flags)
3729 {
3730  return mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_mem_no_alloc(pZip, pFilename, pBuf, buf_size, flags, NULL, 0);
3731 }
3732 
3733 void *mz_zip_reader_extract_to_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, size_t *pSize, mz_uint flags)
3734 {
3735  mz_uint64 comp_size, uncomp_size, alloc_size;
3736  const mz_uint8 *p = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pZip, file_index);
3737  void *pBuf;
3738 
3739  if (pSize)
3740  *pSize = 0;
3741  if (!p)
3742  return NULL;
3743 
3744  comp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3745  uncomp_size = MZ_READ_LE32(p + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
3746 
3747  alloc_size = (flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) ? comp_size : uncomp_size;
3748 #ifdef _MSC_VER
3749  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (alloc_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
3750 #else
3751  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (alloc_size > 0x7FFFFFFF))
3752 #endif
3753  return NULL;
3754  if (NULL == (pBuf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, (size_t)alloc_size)))
3755  return NULL;
3756 
3757  if (!mz_zip_reader_extract_to_mem(pZip, file_index, pBuf, (size_t)alloc_size, flags))
3758  {
3759  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
3760  return NULL;
3761  }
3762 
3763  if (pSize) *pSize = (size_t)alloc_size;
3764  return pBuf;
3765 }
3766 
3767 void *mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, size_t *pSize, mz_uint flags)
3768 {
3769  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
3770  if (file_index < 0)
3771  {
3772  if (pSize) *pSize = 0;
3773  return MZ_FALSE;
3774  }
3775  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_heap(pZip, file_index, pSize, flags);
3776 }
3777 
3778 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, mz_file_write_func pCallback, void *pOpaque, mz_uint flags)
3779 {
3780  int status = TINFL_STATUS_DONE; mz_uint file_crc32 = MZ_CRC32_INIT;
3781  mz_uint64 read_buf_size, read_buf_ofs = 0, read_buf_avail, comp_remaining, out_buf_ofs = 0, cur_file_ofs;
3782  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
3783  void *pRead_buf = NULL; void *pWrite_buf = NULL;
3784  mz_uint32 local_header_u32[(MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(mz_uint32) - 1) / sizeof(mz_uint32)]; mz_uint8 *pLocal_header = (mz_uint8 *)local_header_u32;
3785 
3786  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat))
3787  return MZ_FALSE;
3788 
3789  // Empty file, or a directory (but not always a directory - I've seen odd zips with directories that have compressed data which inflates to 0 bytes)
3790  if (!file_stat.m_comp_size)
3791  return MZ_TRUE;
3792 
3793  // Entry is a subdirectory (I've seen old zips with dir entries which have compressed deflate data which inflates to 0 bytes, but these entries claim to uncompress to 512 bytes in the headers).
3794  // I'm torn how to handle this case - should it fail instead?
3795  if (mz_zip_reader_is_file_a_directory(pZip, file_index))
3796  return MZ_TRUE;
3797 
3798  // Encryption and patch files are not supported.
3799  if (file_stat.m_bit_flag & (1 | 32))
3800  return MZ_FALSE;
3801 
3802  // This function only supports stored and deflate.
3803  if ((!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)) && (file_stat.m_method != 0) && (file_stat.m_method != MZ_DEFLATED))
3804  return MZ_FALSE;
3805 
3806  // Read and parse the local directory entry.
3807  cur_file_ofs = file_stat.m_local_header_ofs;
3808  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pLocal_header, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
3809  return MZ_FALSE;
3810  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pLocal_header) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
3811  return MZ_FALSE;
3812 
3813  cur_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS);
3814  if ((cur_file_ofs + file_stat.m_comp_size) > pZip->m_archive_size)
3815  return MZ_FALSE;
3816 
3817  // Decompress the file either directly from memory or from a file input buffer.
3818  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)
3819  {
3820  pRead_buf = (mz_uint8 *)pZip->m_pState->m_pMem + cur_file_ofs;
3821  read_buf_size = read_buf_avail = file_stat.m_comp_size;
3822  comp_remaining = 0;
3823  }
3824  else
3825  {
3826  read_buf_size = MZ_MIN(file_stat.m_comp_size, MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
3827  if (NULL == (pRead_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, (size_t)read_buf_size)))
3828  return MZ_FALSE;
3829  read_buf_avail = 0;
3830  comp_remaining = file_stat.m_comp_size;
3831  }
3832 
3833  if ((flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA) || (!file_stat.m_method))
3834  {
3835  // The file is stored or the caller has requested the compressed data.
3836  if (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)
3837  {
3838 #ifdef _MSC_VER
3839  if (((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (file_stat.m_comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF))
3840 #else
3841  if (((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32))) && (file_stat.m_comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF))
3842 #endif
3843  return MZ_FALSE;
3844  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pRead_buf, (size_t)file_stat.m_comp_size) != file_stat.m_comp_size)
3845  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3846  else if (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))
3847  file_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(file_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf, (size_t)file_stat.m_comp_size);
3848  cur_file_ofs += file_stat.m_comp_size;
3849  out_buf_ofs += file_stat.m_comp_size;
3850  comp_remaining = 0;
3851  }
3852  else
3853  {
3854  while (comp_remaining)
3855  {
3856  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
3857  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail)
3858  {
3859  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3860  break;
3861  }
3862 
3863  if (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))
3864  file_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(file_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail);
3865 
3866  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail)
3867  {
3868  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3869  break;
3870  }
3871  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
3872  out_buf_ofs += read_buf_avail;
3873  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
3874  }
3875  }
3876  }
3877  else
3878  {
3879  tinfl_decompressor inflator;
3880  tinfl_init(&inflator);
3881 
3882  if (NULL == (pWrite_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE)))
3883  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3884  else
3885  {
3886  do
3887  {
3888  mz_uint8 *pWrite_buf_cur = (mz_uint8 *)pWrite_buf + (out_buf_ofs & (TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - 1));
3889  size_t in_buf_size, out_buf_size = TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - (out_buf_ofs & (TINFL_LZ_DICT_SIZE - 1));
3890  if ((!read_buf_avail) && (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem))
3891  {
3892  read_buf_avail = MZ_MIN(read_buf_size, comp_remaining);
3893  if (pZip->m_pRead(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, pRead_buf, (size_t)read_buf_avail) != read_buf_avail)
3894  {
3895  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3896  break;
3897  }
3898  cur_file_ofs += read_buf_avail;
3899  comp_remaining -= read_buf_avail;
3900  read_buf_ofs = 0;
3901  }
3902 
3903  in_buf_size = (size_t)read_buf_avail;
3904  status = tinfl_decompress(&inflator, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf + read_buf_ofs, &in_buf_size, (mz_uint8 *)pWrite_buf, pWrite_buf_cur, &out_buf_size, comp_remaining ? TINFL_FLAG_HAS_MORE_INPUT : 0);
3905  read_buf_avail -= in_buf_size;
3906  read_buf_ofs += in_buf_size;
3907 
3908  if (out_buf_size)
3909  {
3910  if (pCallback(pOpaque, out_buf_ofs, pWrite_buf_cur, out_buf_size) != out_buf_size)
3911  {
3912  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3913  break;
3914  }
3915  file_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(file_crc32, pWrite_buf_cur, out_buf_size);
3916  if ((out_buf_ofs += out_buf_size) > file_stat.m_uncomp_size)
3917  {
3918  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3919  break;
3920  }
3921  }
3922  } while ((status == TINFL_STATUS_NEEDS_MORE_INPUT) || (status == TINFL_STATUS_HAS_MORE_OUTPUT));
3923  }
3924  }
3925 
3926  if ((status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE) && (!(flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)))
3927  {
3928  // Make sure the entire file was decompressed, and check its CRC.
3929  if ((out_buf_ofs != file_stat.m_uncomp_size) || (file_crc32 != file_stat.m_crc32))
3930  status = TINFL_STATUS_FAILED;
3931  }
3932 
3933  if (!pZip->m_pState->m_pMem)
3934  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
3935  if (pWrite_buf)
3936  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pWrite_buf);
3937 
3938  return status == TINFL_STATUS_DONE;
3939 }
3940 
3941 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_callback(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, mz_file_write_func pCallback, void *pOpaque, mz_uint flags)
3942 {
3943  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pFilename, NULL, flags);
3944  if (file_index < 0)
3945  return MZ_FALSE;
3946  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(pZip, file_index, pCallback, pOpaque, flags);
3947 }
3948 
3949 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3950 static size_t mz_zip_file_write_callback(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 ofs, const void *pBuf, size_t n)
3951 {
3952  (void)ofs; return MZ_FWRITE(pBuf, 1, n, (MZ_FILE*)pOpaque);
3953 }
3954 
3955 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_to_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint file_index, const char *pDst_filename, mz_uint flags)
3956 {
3957  mz_bool status;
3958  mz_zip_archive_file_stat file_stat;
3959  MZ_FILE *pFile;
3960  if (!mz_zip_reader_file_stat(pZip, file_index, &file_stat))
3961  return MZ_FALSE;
3962  pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pDst_filename, "wb");
3963  if (!pFile)
3964  return MZ_FALSE;
3965  status = mz_zip_reader_extract_to_callback(pZip, file_index, mz_zip_file_write_callback, pFile, flags);
3966  if (MZ_FCLOSE(pFile) == EOF)
3967  return MZ_FALSE;
3968 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
3969  if (status)
3970  mz_zip_set_file_times(pDst_filename, file_stat.m_time, file_stat.m_time);
3971 #endif
3972  return status;
3973 }
3974 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3975 
3976 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_end(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
3977 {
3978  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pZip->m_pAlloc) || (!pZip->m_pFree) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
3979  return MZ_FALSE;
3980 
3981  if (pZip->m_pState)
3982  {
3983  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState; pZip->m_pState = NULL;
3984  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir);
3985  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets);
3986  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets);
3987 
3988 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3989  if (pState->m_pFile)
3990  {
3991  MZ_FCLOSE(pState->m_pFile);
3992  pState->m_pFile = NULL;
3993  }
3994 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
3995 
3996  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState);
3997  }
3998  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID;
3999 
4000  return MZ_TRUE;
4001 }
4002 
4003 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4004 mz_bool mz_zip_reader_extract_file_to_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pArchive_filename, const char *pDst_filename, mz_uint flags)
4005 {
4006  int file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(pZip, pArchive_filename, NULL, flags);
4007  if (file_index < 0)
4008  return MZ_FALSE;
4009  return mz_zip_reader_extract_to_file(pZip, file_index, pDst_filename, flags);
4010 }
4011 #endif
4012 
4013 // ------------------- .ZIP archive writing
4014 
4015 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ARCHIVE_WRITING_APIS
4016 
4017 static void mz_write_le16(mz_uint8 *p, mz_uint16 v) { p[0] = (mz_uint8)v; p[1] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 8); }
4018 static void mz_write_le32(mz_uint8 *p, mz_uint32 v) { p[0] = (mz_uint8)v; p[1] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 8); p[2] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 16); p[3] = (mz_uint8)(v >> 24); }
4019 #define MZ_WRITE_LE16(p, v) mz_write_le16((mz_uint8 *)(p), (mz_uint16)(v))
4020 #define MZ_WRITE_LE32(p, v) mz_write_le32((mz_uint8 *)(p), (mz_uint32)(v))
4021 
4022 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint64 existing_size)
4023 {
4024  if ((!pZip) || (pZip->m_pState) || (!pZip->m_pWrite) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID))
4025  return MZ_FALSE;
4026 
4027  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment)
4028  {
4029  // Ensure user specified file offset alignment is a power of 2.
4030  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1))
4031  return MZ_FALSE;
4032  }
4033 
4034  if (!pZip->m_pAlloc) pZip->m_pAlloc = def_alloc_func;
4035  if (!pZip->m_pFree) pZip->m_pFree = def_free_func;
4036  if (!pZip->m_pRealloc) pZip->m_pRealloc = def_realloc_func;
4037 
4038  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING;
4039  pZip->m_archive_size = existing_size;
4040  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
4041  pZip->m_total_files = 0;
4042 
4043  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState = (mz_zip_internal_state *)pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state))))
4044  return MZ_FALSE;
4045  memset(pZip->m_pState, 0, sizeof(mz_zip_internal_state));
4046  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir, sizeof(mz_uint8));
4047  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_central_dir_offsets, sizeof(mz_uint32));
4048  MZ_ZIP_ARRAY_SET_ELEMENT_SIZE(&pZip->m_pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets, sizeof(mz_uint32));
4049  return MZ_TRUE;
4050 }
4051 
4052 static size_t mz_zip_heap_write_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs, const void *pBuf, size_t n)
4053 {
4054  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
4055  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
4056  mz_uint64 new_size = MZ_MAX(file_ofs + n, pState->m_mem_size);
4057 #ifdef _MSC_VER
4058  if ((!n) || ((0, sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32)) && (new_size > 0x7FFFFFFF)))
4059 #else
4060  if ((!n) || ((sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(mz_uint32)) && (new_size > 0x7FFFFFFF)))
4061 #endif
4062  return 0;
4063  if (new_size > pState->m_mem_capacity)
4064  {
4065  void *pNew_block;
4066  size_t new_capacity = MZ_MAX(64, pState->m_mem_capacity); while (new_capacity < new_size) new_capacity *= 2;
4067  if (NULL == (pNew_block = pZip->m_pRealloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState->m_pMem, 1, new_capacity)))
4068  return 0;
4069  pState->m_pMem = pNew_block; pState->m_mem_capacity = new_capacity;
4070  }
4071  memcpy((mz_uint8 *)pState->m_pMem + file_ofs, pBuf, n);
4072  pState->m_mem_size = (size_t)new_size;
4073  return n;
4074 }
4075 
4076 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_heap(mz_zip_archive *pZip, size_t size_to_reserve_at_beginning, size_t initial_allocation_size)
4077 {
4078  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_heap_write_func;
4079  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
4080  if (!mz_zip_writer_init(pZip, size_to_reserve_at_beginning))
4081  return MZ_FALSE;
4082  if (0 != (initial_allocation_size = MZ_MAX(initial_allocation_size, size_to_reserve_at_beginning)))
4083  {
4084  if (NULL == (pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, initial_allocation_size)))
4085  {
4086  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
4087  return MZ_FALSE;
4088  }
4089  pZip->m_pState->m_mem_capacity = initial_allocation_size;
4090  }
4091  return MZ_TRUE;
4092 }
4093 
4094 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4095 static size_t mz_zip_file_write_func(void *pOpaque, mz_uint64 file_ofs, const void *pBuf, size_t n)
4096 {
4097  mz_zip_archive *pZip = (mz_zip_archive *)pOpaque;
4098  mz_int64 cur_ofs = MZ_FTELL64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
4099  if (((mz_int64)file_ofs < 0) || (((cur_ofs != (mz_int64)file_ofs)) && (MZ_FSEEK64(pZip->m_pState->m_pFile, (mz_int64)file_ofs, SEEK_SET))))
4100  return 0;
4101  return MZ_FWRITE(pBuf, 1, n, pZip->m_pState->m_pFile);
4102 }
4103 
4104 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, mz_uint64 size_to_reserve_at_beginning)
4105 {
4106  MZ_FILE *pFile;
4107  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_file_write_func;
4108  pZip->m_pIO_opaque = pZip;
4109  if (!mz_zip_writer_init(pZip, size_to_reserve_at_beginning))
4110  return MZ_FALSE;
4111  if (NULL == (pFile = MZ_FOPEN(pFilename, "wb")))
4112  {
4113  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
4114  return MZ_FALSE;
4115  }
4116  pZip->m_pState->m_pFile = pFile;
4117  if (size_to_reserve_at_beginning)
4118  {
4119  mz_uint64 cur_ofs = 0; char buf[4096]; MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(buf);
4120  do
4121  {
4122  size_t n = (size_t)MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf), size_to_reserve_at_beginning);
4123  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_ofs, buf, n) != n)
4124  {
4125  mz_zip_writer_end(pZip);
4126  return MZ_FALSE;
4127  }
4128  cur_ofs += n; size_to_reserve_at_beginning -= n;
4129  } while (size_to_reserve_at_beginning);
4130  }
4131  return MZ_TRUE;
4132 }
4133 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4134 
4135 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_init_from_reader(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename)
4136 {
4137  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
4138  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_READING))
4139  return MZ_FALSE;
4140  // No sense in trying to write to an archive that's already at the support max size
4141  if ((pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) || ((pZip->m_archive_size + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4142  return MZ_FALSE;
4143 
4144  pState = pZip->m_pState;
4145 
4146  if (pState->m_pFile)
4147  {
4148 #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4149  pFilename; return MZ_FALSE;
4150 #else
4151  // Archive is being read from stdio - try to reopen as writable.
4152  if (pZip->m_pIO_opaque != pZip)
4153  return MZ_FALSE;
4154  if (!pFilename)
4155  return MZ_FALSE;
4156  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_file_write_func;
4157  if (NULL == (pState->m_pFile = MZ_FREOPEN(pFilename, "r+b", pState->m_pFile)))
4158  {
4159  // The mz_zip_archive is now in a bogus state because pState->m_pFile is NULL, so just close it.
4160  mz_zip_reader_end(pZip);
4161  return MZ_FALSE;
4162  }
4163 #endif // #ifdef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4164  }
4165  else if (pState->m_pMem)
4166  {
4167  // Archive lives in a memory block. Assume it's from the heap that we can resize using the realloc callback.
4168  if (pZip->m_pIO_opaque != pZip)
4169  return MZ_FALSE;
4170  pState->m_mem_capacity = pState->m_mem_size;
4171  pZip->m_pWrite = mz_zip_heap_write_func;
4172  }
4173  // Archive is being read via a user provided read function - make sure the user has specified a write function too.
4174  else if (!pZip->m_pWrite)
4175  return MZ_FALSE;
4176 
4177  // Start writing new files at the archive's current central directory location.
4178  pZip->m_archive_size = pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs;
4179  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING;
4180  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = 0;
4181 
4182  return MZ_TRUE;
4183 }
4184 
4185 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_mem(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pArchive_name, const void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, mz_uint level_and_flags)
4186 {
4187  return mz_zip_writer_add_mem_ex(pZip, pArchive_name, pBuf, buf_size, NULL, 0, level_and_flags, 0, 0);
4188 }
4189 
4190 typedef struct
4191 {
4192  mz_zip_archive *m_pZip;
4193  mz_uint64 m_cur_archive_file_ofs;
4194  mz_uint64 m_comp_size;
4195 } mz_zip_writer_add_state;
4196 
4197 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_put_buf_callback(const void* pBuf, int len, void *pUser)
4198 {
4199  mz_zip_writer_add_state *pState = (mz_zip_writer_add_state *)pUser;
4200  if ((int)pState->m_pZip->m_pWrite(pState->m_pZip->m_pIO_opaque, pState->m_cur_archive_file_ofs, pBuf, len) != len)
4201  return MZ_FALSE;
4202  pState->m_cur_archive_file_ofs += len;
4203  pState->m_comp_size += len;
4204  return MZ_TRUE;
4205 }
4206 
4207 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_create_local_dir_header(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint8 *pDst, mz_uint16 filename_size, mz_uint16 extra_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint64 comp_size, mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method, mz_uint16 bit_flags, mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date)
4208 {
4209  (void)pZip;
4210  memset(pDst, 0, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE);
4211  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_SIG_OFS, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG);
4212  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS, method ? 20 : 0);
4213  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS, bit_flags);
4214  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_METHOD_OFS, method);
4215  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_TIME_OFS, dos_time);
4216  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILE_DATE_OFS, dos_date);
4217  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_CRC32_OFS, uncomp_crc32);
4218  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, comp_size);
4219  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, uncomp_size);
4220  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS, filename_size);
4221  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS, extra_size);
4222  return MZ_TRUE;
4223 }
4224 
4225 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_create_central_dir_header(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint8 *pDst, mz_uint16 filename_size, mz_uint16 extra_size, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint64 comp_size, mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method, mz_uint16 bit_flags, mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date, mz_uint64 local_header_ofs, mz_uint32 ext_attributes)
4226 {
4227  (void)pZip;
4228  memset(pDst, 0, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE);
4229  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_SIG_OFS, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG);
4230  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_VERSION_NEEDED_OFS, method ? 20 : 0);
4231  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS, bit_flags);
4232  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_METHOD_OFS, method);
4233  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_TIME_OFS, dos_time);
4234  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILE_DATE_OFS, dos_date);
4235  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_CRC32_OFS, uncomp_crc32);
4236  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, comp_size);
4237  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_DECOMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS, uncomp_size);
4238  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS, filename_size);
4239  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS, extra_size);
4240  MZ_WRITE_LE16(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS, comment_size);
4241  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTERNAL_ATTR_OFS, ext_attributes);
4242  MZ_WRITE_LE32(pDst + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS, local_header_ofs);
4243  return MZ_TRUE;
4244 }
4245 
4246 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_to_central_dir(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pFilename, mz_uint16 filename_size, const void *pExtra, mz_uint16 extra_size, const void *pComment, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint64 comp_size, mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32, mz_uint16 method, mz_uint16 bit_flags, mz_uint16 dos_time, mz_uint16 dos_date, mz_uint64 local_header_ofs, mz_uint32 ext_attributes)
4247 {
4248  mz_zip_internal_state *pState = pZip->m_pState;
4249  mz_uint32 central_dir_ofs = (mz_uint32)pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
4250  size_t orig_central_dir_size = pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
4251  mz_uint8 central_dir_header[MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
4252 
4253  // No zip64 support yet
4254  if ((local_header_ofs > 0xFFFFFFFF) || (((mz_uint64)pState->m_central_dir.m_size + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + filename_size + extra_size + comment_size) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4255  return MZ_FALSE;
4256 
4257  if (!mz_zip_writer_create_central_dir_header(pZip, central_dir_header, filename_size, extra_size, comment_size, uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, bit_flags, dos_time, dos_date, local_header_ofs, ext_attributes))
4258  return MZ_FALSE;
4259 
4260  if ((!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, central_dir_header, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)) ||
4261  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pFilename, filename_size)) ||
4262  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pExtra, extra_size)) ||
4263  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pComment, comment_size)) ||
4264  (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets, &central_dir_ofs, 1)))
4265  {
4266  // Try to push the central directory array back into its original state.
4267  mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, orig_central_dir_size, MZ_FALSE);
4268  return MZ_FALSE;
4269  }
4270 
4271  return MZ_TRUE;
4272 }
4273 
4274 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_validate_archive_name(const char *pArchive_name)
4275 {
4276  // Basic ZIP archive filename validity checks: Valid filenames cannot start with a forward slash, cannot contain a drive letter, and cannot use DOS-style backward slashes.
4277  if (*pArchive_name == '/')
4278  return MZ_FALSE;
4279  while (*pArchive_name)
4280  {
4281  if ((*pArchive_name == '\\') || (*pArchive_name == ':'))
4282  return MZ_FALSE;
4283  pArchive_name++;
4284  }
4285  return MZ_TRUE;
4286 }
4287 
4288 static mz_uint mz_zip_writer_compute_padding_needed_for_file_alignment(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
4289 {
4290  mz_uint32 n;
4291  if (!pZip->m_file_offset_alignment)
4292  return 0;
4293  n = (mz_uint32)(pZip->m_archive_size & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1));
4294  return (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - n) & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1);
4295 }
4296 
4297 static mz_bool mz_zip_writer_write_zeros(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_uint64 cur_file_ofs, mz_uint32 n)
4298 {
4299  char buf[4096];
4300  memset(buf, 0, MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf), n));
4301  while (n)
4302  {
4303  mz_uint32 s = MZ_MIN(sizeof(buf), n);
4304  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_file_ofs, buf, s) != s)
4305  return MZ_FALSE;
4306  cur_file_ofs += s; n -= s;
4307  }
4308  return MZ_TRUE;
4309 }
4310 
4311 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_mem_ex(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pArchive_name, const void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, const void *pComment, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint level_and_flags, mz_uint64 uncomp_size, mz_uint32 uncomp_crc32)
4312 {
4313  mz_uint16 method = 0, dos_time = 0, dos_date = 0;
4314  mz_uint level, ext_attributes = 0, num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4315  mz_uint64 local_dir_header_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size, cur_archive_file_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size, comp_size = 0;
4316  size_t archive_name_size;
4317  mz_uint8 local_dir_header[MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
4318  tdefl_compressor *pComp = NULL;
4319  mz_bool store_data_uncompressed;
4320  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
4321 
4322  if ((int)level_and_flags < 0)
4323  level_and_flags = MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL;
4324  level = level_and_flags & 0xF;
4325  store_data_uncompressed = ((!level) || (level_and_flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA));
4326 
4327  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING) || ((buf_size) && (!pBuf)) || (!pArchive_name) || ((comment_size) && (!pComment)) || (pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) || (level > MZ_UBER_COMPRESSION))
4328  return MZ_FALSE;
4329 
4330  pState = pZip->m_pState;
4331 
4332  if ((!(level_and_flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)) && (uncomp_size))
4333  return MZ_FALSE;
4334  // No zip64 support yet
4335  if ((buf_size > 0xFFFFFFFF) || (uncomp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4336  return MZ_FALSE;
4337  if (!mz_zip_writer_validate_archive_name(pArchive_name))
4338  return MZ_FALSE;
4339 
4340 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4341  {
4342  time_t cur_time; time(&cur_time);
4343  mz_zip_time_to_dos_time(cur_time, &dos_time, &dos_date);
4344  }
4345 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_TIME
4346 
4347  archive_name_size = strlen(pArchive_name);
4348  if (archive_name_size > 0xFFFF)
4349  return MZ_FALSE;
4350 
4351  num_alignment_padding_bytes = mz_zip_writer_compute_padding_needed_for_file_alignment(pZip);
4352 
4353  // no zip64 support yet
4354  if ((pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) || ((pZip->m_archive_size + num_alignment_padding_bytes + MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + comment_size + archive_name_size) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4355  return MZ_FALSE;
4356 
4357  if ((archive_name_size) && (pArchive_name[archive_name_size - 1] == '/'))
4358  {
4359  // Set DOS Subdirectory attribute bit.
4360  ext_attributes |= 0x10;
4361  // Subdirectories cannot contain data.
4362  if ((buf_size) || (uncomp_size))
4363  return MZ_FALSE;
4364  }
4365 
4366  // Try to do any allocations before writing to the archive, so if an allocation fails the file remains unmodified. (A good idea if we're doing an in-place modification.)
4367  if ((!mz_zip_array_ensure_room(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + archive_name_size + comment_size)) || (!mz_zip_array_ensure_room(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets, 1)))
4368  return MZ_FALSE;
4369 
4370  if ((!store_data_uncompressed) && (buf_size))
4371  {
4372  if (NULL == (pComp = (tdefl_compressor *)pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(tdefl_compressor))))
4373  return MZ_FALSE;
4374  }
4375 
4376  if (!mz_zip_writer_write_zeros(pZip, cur_archive_file_ofs, num_alignment_padding_bytes + sizeof(local_dir_header)))
4377  {
4378  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4379  return MZ_FALSE;
4380  }
4381  local_dir_header_ofs += num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4382  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment) { MZ_ASSERT((local_dir_header_ofs & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1)) == 0); }
4383  cur_archive_file_ofs += num_alignment_padding_bytes + sizeof(local_dir_header);
4384 
4385  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(local_dir_header);
4386  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_archive_file_ofs, pArchive_name, archive_name_size) != archive_name_size)
4387  {
4388  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4389  return MZ_FALSE;
4390  }
4391  cur_archive_file_ofs += archive_name_size;
4392 
4393  if (!(level_and_flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA))
4394  {
4395  uncomp_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(MZ_CRC32_INIT, (const mz_uint8*)pBuf, buf_size);
4396  uncomp_size = buf_size;
4397  if (uncomp_size <= 3)
4398  {
4399  level = 0;
4400  store_data_uncompressed = MZ_TRUE;
4401  }
4402  }
4403 
4404  if (store_data_uncompressed)
4405  {
4406  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_archive_file_ofs, pBuf, buf_size) != buf_size)
4407  {
4408  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4409  return MZ_FALSE;
4410  }
4411 
4412  cur_archive_file_ofs += buf_size;
4413  comp_size = buf_size;
4414 
4415  if (level_and_flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)
4416  method = MZ_DEFLATED;
4417  }
4418  else if (buf_size)
4419  {
4420  mz_zip_writer_add_state state;
4421 
4422  state.m_pZip = pZip;
4423  state.m_cur_archive_file_ofs = cur_archive_file_ofs;
4424  state.m_comp_size = 0;
4425 
4426  if ((tdefl_init(pComp, mz_zip_writer_add_put_buf_callback, &state, tdefl_create_comp_flags_from_zip_params(level, -15, MZ_DEFAULT_STRATEGY)) != TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY) ||
4427  (tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp, pBuf, buf_size, TDEFL_FINISH) != TDEFL_STATUS_DONE))
4428  {
4429  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4430  return MZ_FALSE;
4431  }
4432 
4433  comp_size = state.m_comp_size;
4434  cur_archive_file_ofs = state.m_cur_archive_file_ofs;
4435 
4436  method = MZ_DEFLATED;
4437  }
4438 
4439  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4440  pComp = NULL;
4441 
4442  // no zip64 support yet
4443  if ((comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF) || (cur_archive_file_ofs > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4444  return MZ_FALSE;
4445 
4446  if (!mz_zip_writer_create_local_dir_header(pZip, local_dir_header, (mz_uint16)archive_name_size, 0, uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, 0, dos_time, dos_date))
4447  return MZ_FALSE;
4448 
4449  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, local_dir_header_ofs, local_dir_header, sizeof(local_dir_header)) != sizeof(local_dir_header))
4450  return MZ_FALSE;
4451 
4452  if (!mz_zip_writer_add_to_central_dir(pZip, pArchive_name, (mz_uint16)archive_name_size, NULL, 0, pComment, comment_size, uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, 0, dos_time, dos_date, local_dir_header_ofs, ext_attributes))
4453  return MZ_FALSE;
4454 
4455  pZip->m_total_files++;
4456  pZip->m_archive_size = cur_archive_file_ofs;
4457 
4458  return MZ_TRUE;
4459 }
4460 
4461 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4462 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_file(mz_zip_archive *pZip, const char *pArchive_name, const char *pSrc_filename, const void *pComment, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint level_and_flags)
4463 {
4464  mz_uint uncomp_crc32 = MZ_CRC32_INIT, level, num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4465  mz_uint16 method = 0, dos_time = 0, dos_date = 0, ext_attributes = 0;
4466  mz_uint64 local_dir_header_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size, cur_archive_file_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size, uncomp_size = 0, comp_size = 0;
4467  size_t archive_name_size;
4468  mz_uint8 local_dir_header[MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
4469  MZ_FILE *pSrc_file = NULL;
4470 
4471  if ((int)level_and_flags < 0)
4472  level_and_flags = MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL;
4473  level = level_and_flags & 0xF;
4474 
4475  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING) || (!pArchive_name) || ((comment_size) && (!pComment)) || (level > MZ_UBER_COMPRESSION))
4476  return MZ_FALSE;
4477  if (level_and_flags & MZ_ZIP_FLAG_COMPRESSED_DATA)
4478  return MZ_FALSE;
4479  if (!mz_zip_writer_validate_archive_name(pArchive_name))
4480  return MZ_FALSE;
4481 
4482  archive_name_size = strlen(pArchive_name);
4483  if (archive_name_size > 0xFFFF)
4484  return MZ_FALSE;
4485 
4486  num_alignment_padding_bytes = mz_zip_writer_compute_padding_needed_for_file_alignment(pZip);
4487 
4488  // no zip64 support yet
4489  if ((pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) || ((pZip->m_archive_size + num_alignment_padding_bytes + MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + comment_size + archive_name_size) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4490  return MZ_FALSE;
4491 
4492  if (!mz_zip_get_file_modified_time(pSrc_filename, &dos_time, &dos_date))
4493  return MZ_FALSE;
4494 
4495  pSrc_file = MZ_FOPEN(pSrc_filename, "rb");
4496  if (!pSrc_file)
4497  return MZ_FALSE;
4498  MZ_FSEEK64(pSrc_file, 0, SEEK_END);
4499  uncomp_size = MZ_FTELL64(pSrc_file);
4500  MZ_FSEEK64(pSrc_file, 0, SEEK_SET);
4501 
4502  if (uncomp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF)
4503  {
4504  // No zip64 support yet
4505  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4506  return MZ_FALSE;
4507  }
4508  if (uncomp_size <= 3)
4509  level = 0;
4510 
4511  if (!mz_zip_writer_write_zeros(pZip, cur_archive_file_ofs, num_alignment_padding_bytes + sizeof(local_dir_header)))
4512  {
4513  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4514  return MZ_FALSE;
4515  }
4516  local_dir_header_ofs += num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4517  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment) { MZ_ASSERT((local_dir_header_ofs & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1)) == 0); }
4518  cur_archive_file_ofs += num_alignment_padding_bytes + sizeof(local_dir_header);
4519 
4520  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(local_dir_header);
4521  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_archive_file_ofs, pArchive_name, archive_name_size) != archive_name_size)
4522  {
4523  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4524  return MZ_FALSE;
4525  }
4526  cur_archive_file_ofs += archive_name_size;
4527 
4528  if (uncomp_size)
4529  {
4530  mz_uint64 uncomp_remaining = uncomp_size;
4531  void *pRead_buf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
4532  if (!pRead_buf)
4533  {
4534  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4535  return MZ_FALSE;
4536  }
4537 
4538  if (!level)
4539  {
4540  while (uncomp_remaining)
4541  {
4542  mz_uint n = (mz_uint)MZ_MIN(MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE, uncomp_remaining);
4543  if ((MZ_FREAD(pRead_buf, 1, n, pSrc_file) != n) || (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_archive_file_ofs, pRead_buf, n) != n))
4544  {
4545  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
4546  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4547  return MZ_FALSE;
4548  }
4549  uncomp_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(uncomp_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf, n);
4550  uncomp_remaining -= n;
4551  cur_archive_file_ofs += n;
4552  }
4553  comp_size = uncomp_size;
4554  }
4555  else
4556  {
4557  mz_bool result = MZ_FALSE;
4558  mz_zip_writer_add_state state;
4559  tdefl_compressor *pComp = (tdefl_compressor *)pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, sizeof(tdefl_compressor));
4560  if (!pComp)
4561  {
4562  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
4563  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4564  return MZ_FALSE;
4565  }
4566 
4567  state.m_pZip = pZip;
4568  state.m_cur_archive_file_ofs = cur_archive_file_ofs;
4569  state.m_comp_size = 0;
4570 
4571  if (tdefl_init(pComp, mz_zip_writer_add_put_buf_callback, &state, tdefl_create_comp_flags_from_zip_params(level, -15, MZ_DEFAULT_STRATEGY)) != TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY)
4572  {
4573  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4574  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
4575  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4576  return MZ_FALSE;
4577  }
4578 
4579  for ( ; ; )
4580  {
4581  size_t in_buf_size = (mz_uint32)MZ_MIN(uncomp_remaining, MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE);
4582  tdefl_status status;
4583 
4584  if (MZ_FREAD(pRead_buf, 1, in_buf_size, pSrc_file) != in_buf_size)
4585  break;
4586 
4587  uncomp_crc32 = (mz_uint32)mz_crc32(uncomp_crc32, (const mz_uint8 *)pRead_buf, in_buf_size);
4588  uncomp_remaining -= in_buf_size;
4589 
4590  status = tdefl_compress_buffer(pComp, pRead_buf, in_buf_size, uncomp_remaining ? TDEFL_NO_FLUSH : TDEFL_FINISH);
4591  if (status == TDEFL_STATUS_DONE)
4592  {
4593  result = MZ_TRUE;
4594  break;
4595  }
4596  else if (status != TDEFL_STATUS_OKAY)
4597  break;
4598  }
4599 
4600  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pComp);
4601 
4602  if (!result)
4603  {
4604  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
4605  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file);
4606  return MZ_FALSE;
4607  }
4608 
4609  comp_size = state.m_comp_size;
4610  cur_archive_file_ofs = state.m_cur_archive_file_ofs;
4611 
4612  method = MZ_DEFLATED;
4613  }
4614 
4615  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pRead_buf);
4616  }
4617 
4618  MZ_FCLOSE(pSrc_file); pSrc_file = NULL;
4619 
4620  // no zip64 support yet
4621  if ((comp_size > 0xFFFFFFFF) || (cur_archive_file_ofs > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4622  return MZ_FALSE;
4623 
4624  if (!mz_zip_writer_create_local_dir_header(pZip, local_dir_header, (mz_uint16)archive_name_size, 0, uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, 0, dos_time, dos_date))
4625  return MZ_FALSE;
4626 
4627  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, local_dir_header_ofs, local_dir_header, sizeof(local_dir_header)) != sizeof(local_dir_header))
4628  return MZ_FALSE;
4629 
4630  if (!mz_zip_writer_add_to_central_dir(pZip, pArchive_name, (mz_uint16)archive_name_size, NULL, 0, pComment, comment_size, uncomp_size, comp_size, uncomp_crc32, method, 0, dos_time, dos_date, local_dir_header_ofs, ext_attributes))
4631  return MZ_FALSE;
4632 
4633  pZip->m_total_files++;
4634  pZip->m_archive_size = cur_archive_file_ofs;
4635 
4636  return MZ_TRUE;
4637 }
4638 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4639 
4640 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_add_from_zip_reader(mz_zip_archive *pZip, mz_zip_archive *pSource_zip, mz_uint file_index)
4641 {
4642  mz_uint n, bit_flags, num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4643  mz_uint64 comp_bytes_remaining, local_dir_header_ofs;
4644  mz_uint64 cur_src_file_ofs, cur_dst_file_ofs;
4645  mz_uint32 local_header_u32[(MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(mz_uint32) - 1) / sizeof(mz_uint32)]; mz_uint8 *pLocal_header = (mz_uint8 *)local_header_u32;
4646  mz_uint8 central_header[MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
4647  size_t orig_central_dir_size;
4648  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
4649  void *pBuf; const mz_uint8 *pSrc_central_header;
4650 
4651  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING))
4652  return MZ_FALSE;
4653  if (NULL == (pSrc_central_header = mz_zip_reader_get_cdh(pSource_zip, file_index)))
4654  return MZ_FALSE;
4655  pState = pZip->m_pState;
4656 
4657  num_alignment_padding_bytes = mz_zip_writer_compute_padding_needed_for_file_alignment(pZip);
4658 
4659  // no zip64 support yet
4660  if ((pZip->m_total_files == 0xFFFF) || ((pZip->m_archive_size + num_alignment_padding_bytes + MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4661  return MZ_FALSE;
4662 
4663  cur_src_file_ofs = MZ_READ_LE32(pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS);
4664  cur_dst_file_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size;
4665 
4666  if (pSource_zip->m_pRead(pSource_zip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_src_file_ofs, pLocal_header, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
4667  return MZ_FALSE;
4668  if (MZ_READ_LE32(pLocal_header) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG)
4669  return MZ_FALSE;
4670  cur_src_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
4671 
4672  if (!mz_zip_writer_write_zeros(pZip, cur_dst_file_ofs, num_alignment_padding_bytes))
4673  return MZ_FALSE;
4674  cur_dst_file_ofs += num_alignment_padding_bytes;
4675  local_dir_header_ofs = cur_dst_file_ofs;
4676  if (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment) { MZ_ASSERT((local_dir_header_ofs & (pZip->m_file_offset_alignment - 1)) == 0); }
4677 
4678  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_dst_file_ofs, pLocal_header, MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) != MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE)
4679  return MZ_FALSE;
4680  cur_dst_file_ofs += MZ_ZIP_LOCAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE;
4681 
4682  n = MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS);
4683  comp_bytes_remaining = n + MZ_READ_LE32(pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMPRESSED_SIZE_OFS);
4684 
4685  if (NULL == (pBuf = pZip->m_pAlloc(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, 1, (size_t)MZ_MAX(sizeof(mz_uint32) * 4, MZ_MIN(MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE, comp_bytes_remaining)))))
4686  return MZ_FALSE;
4687 
4688  while (comp_bytes_remaining)
4689  {
4690  n = (mz_uint)MZ_MIN(MZ_ZIP_MAX_IO_BUF_SIZE, comp_bytes_remaining);
4691  if (pSource_zip->m_pRead(pSource_zip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_src_file_ofs, pBuf, n) != n)
4692  {
4693  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
4694  return MZ_FALSE;
4695  }
4696  cur_src_file_ofs += n;
4697 
4698  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_dst_file_ofs, pBuf, n) != n)
4699  {
4700  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
4701  return MZ_FALSE;
4702  }
4703  cur_dst_file_ofs += n;
4704 
4705  comp_bytes_remaining -= n;
4706  }
4707 
4708  bit_flags = MZ_READ_LE16(pLocal_header + MZ_ZIP_LDH_BIT_FLAG_OFS);
4709  if (bit_flags & 8)
4710  {
4711  // Copy data descriptor
4712  if (pSource_zip->m_pRead(pSource_zip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_src_file_ofs, pBuf, sizeof(mz_uint32) * 4) != sizeof(mz_uint32) * 4)
4713  {
4714  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
4715  return MZ_FALSE;
4716  }
4717 
4718  n = sizeof(mz_uint32) * ((MZ_READ_LE32(pBuf) == 0x08074b50) ? 4 : 3);
4719  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, cur_dst_file_ofs, pBuf, n) != n)
4720  {
4721  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
4722  return MZ_FALSE;
4723  }
4724 
4725  cur_src_file_ofs += n;
4726  cur_dst_file_ofs += n;
4727  }
4728  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pBuf);
4729 
4730  // no zip64 support yet
4731  if (cur_dst_file_ofs > 0xFFFFFFFF)
4732  return MZ_FALSE;
4733 
4734  orig_central_dir_size = pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
4735 
4736  memcpy(central_header, pSrc_central_header, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE);
4737  MZ_WRITE_LE32(central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_LOCAL_HEADER_OFS, local_dir_header_ofs);
4738  if (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, central_header, MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE))
4739  return MZ_FALSE;
4740 
4741  n = MZ_READ_LE16(pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_FILENAME_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_EXTRA_LEN_OFS) + MZ_READ_LE16(pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CDH_COMMENT_LEN_OFS);
4742  if (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, pSrc_central_header + MZ_ZIP_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE, n))
4743  {
4744  mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, orig_central_dir_size, MZ_FALSE);
4745  return MZ_FALSE;
4746  }
4747 
4748  if (pState->m_central_dir.m_size > 0xFFFFFFFF)
4749  return MZ_FALSE;
4750  n = (mz_uint32)orig_central_dir_size;
4751  if (!mz_zip_array_push_back(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets, &n, 1))
4752  {
4753  mz_zip_array_resize(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir, orig_central_dir_size, MZ_FALSE);
4754  return MZ_FALSE;
4755  }
4756 
4757  pZip->m_total_files++;
4758  pZip->m_archive_size = cur_dst_file_ofs;
4759 
4760  return MZ_TRUE;
4761 }
4762 
4763 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_finalize_archive(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
4764 {
4765  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
4766  mz_uint64 central_dir_ofs, central_dir_size;
4767  mz_uint8 hdr[MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE];
4768 
4769  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING))
4770  return MZ_FALSE;
4771 
4772  pState = pZip->m_pState;
4773 
4774  // no zip64 support yet
4775  if ((pZip->m_total_files > 0xFFFF) || ((pZip->m_archive_size + pState->m_central_dir.m_size + MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIZE) > 0xFFFFFFFF))
4776  return MZ_FALSE;
4777 
4778  central_dir_ofs = 0;
4779  central_dir_size = 0;
4780  if (pZip->m_total_files)
4781  {
4782  // Write central directory
4783  central_dir_ofs = pZip->m_archive_size;
4784  central_dir_size = pState->m_central_dir.m_size;
4785  pZip->m_central_directory_file_ofs = central_dir_ofs;
4786  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, central_dir_ofs, pState->m_central_dir.m_p, (size_t)central_dir_size) != central_dir_size)
4787  return MZ_FALSE;
4788  pZip->m_archive_size += central_dir_size;
4789  }
4790 
4791  // Write end of central directory record
4792  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(hdr);
4793  MZ_WRITE_LE32(hdr + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_SIG_OFS, MZ_ZIP_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_HEADER_SIG);
4794  MZ_WRITE_LE16(hdr + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_NUM_ENTRIES_ON_DISK_OFS, pZip->m_total_files);
4795  MZ_WRITE_LE16(hdr + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_TOTAL_ENTRIES_OFS, pZip->m_total_files);
4796  MZ_WRITE_LE32(hdr + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_SIZE_OFS, central_dir_size);
4797  MZ_WRITE_LE32(hdr + MZ_ZIP_ECDH_CDIR_OFS_OFS, central_dir_ofs);
4798 
4799  if (pZip->m_pWrite(pZip->m_pIO_opaque, pZip->m_archive_size, hdr, sizeof(hdr)) != sizeof(hdr))
4800  return MZ_FALSE;
4801 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4802  if ((pState->m_pFile) && (MZ_FFLUSH(pState->m_pFile) == EOF))
4803  return MZ_FALSE;
4804 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4805 
4806  pZip->m_archive_size += sizeof(hdr);
4807 
4808  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING_HAS_BEEN_FINALIZED;
4809  return MZ_TRUE;
4810 }
4811 
4812 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_finalize_heap_archive(mz_zip_archive *pZip, void **pBuf, size_t *pSize)
4813 {
4814  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pBuf) || (!pSize))
4815  return MZ_FALSE;
4816  if (pZip->m_pWrite != mz_zip_heap_write_func)
4817  return MZ_FALSE;
4818  if (!mz_zip_writer_finalize_archive(pZip))
4819  return MZ_FALSE;
4820 
4821  *pBuf = pZip->m_pState->m_pMem;
4822  *pSize = pZip->m_pState->m_mem_size;
4823  pZip->m_pState->m_pMem = NULL;
4824  pZip->m_pState->m_mem_size = pZip->m_pState->m_mem_capacity = 0;
4825  return MZ_TRUE;
4826 }
4827 
4828 mz_bool mz_zip_writer_end(mz_zip_archive *pZip)
4829 {
4830  mz_zip_internal_state *pState;
4831  mz_bool status = MZ_TRUE;
4832  if ((!pZip) || (!pZip->m_pState) || (!pZip->m_pAlloc) || (!pZip->m_pFree) || ((pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING) && (pZip->m_zip_mode != MZ_ZIP_MODE_WRITING_HAS_BEEN_FINALIZED)))
4833  return MZ_FALSE;
4834 
4835  pState = pZip->m_pState;
4836  pZip->m_pState = NULL;
4837  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir);
4838  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_central_dir_offsets);
4839  mz_zip_array_clear(pZip, &pState->m_sorted_central_dir_offsets);
4840 
4841 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4842  if (pState->m_pFile)
4843  {
4844  MZ_FCLOSE(pState->m_pFile);
4845  pState->m_pFile = NULL;
4846  }
4847 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4848 
4849  if ((pZip->m_pWrite == mz_zip_heap_write_func) && (pState->m_pMem))
4850  {
4851  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState->m_pMem);
4852  pState->m_pMem = NULL;
4853  }
4854 
4855  pZip->m_pFree(pZip->m_pAlloc_opaque, pState);
4856  pZip->m_zip_mode = MZ_ZIP_MODE_INVALID;
4857  return status;
4858 }
4859 
4860 #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4861 mz_bool mz_zip_add_mem_to_archive_file_in_place(const char *pZip_filename, const char *pArchive_name, const void *pBuf, size_t buf_size, const void *pComment, mz_uint16 comment_size, mz_uint level_and_flags)
4862 {
4863  mz_bool status, created_new_archive = MZ_FALSE;
4864  mz_zip_archive zip_archive;
4865  struct MZ_FILE_STAT_STRUCT file_stat;
4866  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(zip_archive);
4867  if ((int)level_and_flags < 0)
4868  level_and_flags = MZ_DEFAULT_LEVEL;
4869  if ((!pZip_filename) || (!pArchive_name) || ((buf_size) && (!pBuf)) || ((comment_size) && (!pComment)) || ((level_and_flags & 0xF) > MZ_UBER_COMPRESSION))
4870  return MZ_FALSE;
4871  if (!mz_zip_writer_validate_archive_name(pArchive_name))
4872  return MZ_FALSE;
4873  if (MZ_FILE_STAT(pZip_filename, &file_stat) != 0)
4874  {
4875  // Create a new archive.
4876  if (!mz_zip_writer_init_file(&zip_archive, pZip_filename, 0))
4877  return MZ_FALSE;
4878  created_new_archive = MZ_TRUE;
4879  }
4880  else
4881  {
4882  // Append to an existing archive.
4883  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_file(&zip_archive, pZip_filename, level_and_flags | MZ_ZIP_FLAG_DO_NOT_SORT_CENTRAL_DIRECTORY))
4884  return MZ_FALSE;
4885  if (!mz_zip_writer_init_from_reader(&zip_archive, pZip_filename))
4886  {
4887  mz_zip_reader_end(&zip_archive);
4888  return MZ_FALSE;
4889  }
4890  }
4891  status = mz_zip_writer_add_mem_ex(&zip_archive, pArchive_name, pBuf, buf_size, pComment, comment_size, level_and_flags, 0, 0);
4892  // Always finalize, even if adding failed for some reason, so we have a valid central directory. (This may not always succeed, but we can try.)
4893  if (!mz_zip_writer_finalize_archive(&zip_archive))
4894  status = MZ_FALSE;
4895  if (!mz_zip_writer_end(&zip_archive))
4896  status = MZ_FALSE;
4897  if ((!status) && (created_new_archive))
4898  {
4899  // It's a new archive and something went wrong, so just delete it.
4900  int ignoredStatus = MZ_DELETE_FILE(pZip_filename);
4901  (void)ignoredStatus;
4902  }
4903  return status;
4904 }
4905 
4906 void *mz_zip_extract_archive_file_to_heap(const char *pZip_filename, const char *pArchive_name, size_t *pSize, mz_uint flags)
4907 {
4908  int file_index;
4909  mz_zip_archive zip_archive;
4910  void *p = NULL;
4911 
4912  if (pSize)
4913  *pSize = 0;
4914 
4915  if ((!pZip_filename) || (!pArchive_name))
4916  return NULL;
4917 
4918  MZ_CLEAR_OBJ(zip_archive);
4919  if (!mz_zip_reader_init_file(&zip_archive, pZip_filename, flags | MZ_ZIP_FLAG_DO_NOT_SORT_CENTRAL_DIRECTORY))
4920  return NULL;
4921 
4922  if ((file_index = mz_zip_reader_locate_file(&zip_archive, pArchive_name, NULL, flags)) >= 0)
4923  p = mz_zip_reader_extract_to_heap(&zip_archive, file_index, pSize, flags);
4924 
4925  mz_zip_reader_end(&zip_archive);
4926  return p;
4927 }
4928 
4929 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_STDIO
4930 
4931 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ARCHIVE_WRITING_APIS
4932 
4933 #endif // #ifndef MINIZ_NO_ARCHIVE_APIS
4934 
4935 #ifdef __cplusplus
4936 }
4937 #endif
4938 
4939 #endif // MINIZ_HEADER_FILE_ONLY
